palette_types.name: Seasonal
palette_types.description: Colors associated with seasons and holidays

description_i18n.en: Colors associated with seasons and holidays
description_i18n.zh: Colors associated with seasons and holidays

notes: Each palette contains 3-6 colors that work well together.
Colors are listed in order of dominance - first colors are primary, later are accent.
Anime classic palettes are based on common anime character archetypes.
i18n_notes: Localized names are provided for en/zh. Unknown tokens fall back to English.
